sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './../Post/Post.css' import Comment from './../img/comment.png' import Share from './../img/share.png' import Like from './../img/like.png' import NotLike from './../img/notlike.png' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' const Post = ({data}) => { const {user} =useSelector((state)=>state.authReducer.authData) return (
{data.likes} likes
{data.name} {data.desc}
) } export default Post
